org.eclipse.swt.examples.addressbook

クラス SearchDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.examples.addressbook.SearchDialog

  • public class SearchDialog
extends java.lang.Object
    SearchDialog is a simple class that uses org.eclipse.swt libraries to implement a basic search dialog.

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      SearchDialog(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell parent)
      Class constructor that sets the parent shell and the table widget that the dialog will search.

        public SearchDialog(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell parent)
        Class constructor that sets the parent shell and the table widget that the dialog will search.
        パラメータ:
        parent - Shell The shell that is the parent of the dialog.
